medium: Linen weft/cotton warp.  Metallic in some pieces.
title: Apple Tree Project
description: This project follows a design from onset to end & shows textiles in various stages of design and correction?to the finished product.  Vertical branches with apples & leaves.  Design formed by using full warp & weft;  background is decreased. Clipped twice Cream & Dk. Cream.  (Var. 1) natural
